name: DoGiBo
instructions:
Send a donation to the animal shelter. 
Donate what ever you want.  
The easiest way would  be with betterplaces.org:  
>[betterplaces.org](https://www.betterplace.org/de/projects/69645-unterstuetzung-fuer-das-tierheim-freital) 

Choose a tip for Betterplaces.org as you like.

A good alternative is the classic old transfer: 

 >Animal Shelter Dogville e. V.  
Bank: Animal Bank Dogville  
IBAN: DE00 0000 0000 0000 0000 00  
SWIFT-BIC: GETSWIFTY 

 Remember to add your address to deduct this donation in your income tax return.
background:
![Image](http://www.tierheim-freital.de/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Arnie-300x300.jpg)

 This is 'Arnie'

 ...one of the many dogs in the Animal Shelter Dogville. 

Here is the reason why you should donate something to animals like Arnie ... 

Bone for Arnie ..... Cricket for some exotic animal.... 

 The donation will be spend for [Food, Medicine ...](https://www.betterplace.org/de/projects/69645-unterstuetzung-fuer-das-tierheim-freital).
